TEI.2.document_title: Perry and Hunter to Stephen F Austin, 11-29-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: Perry & Hunter to Austin, November 29, 1832. Cattle collections.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 894

div1.p: Perry & Hunter to Austin, November 29, 1832. Cattle collections.
Recd, on a/c Mrs. Sarah Gilbert and Preston Gilberts Notes Geo.
Tennells ord. on S. F. A________$60.00
Brand F 1 Blk. Steer. 8 Years old_______ 10.00
"NR 1 Red and White Cow and Red Calf______ 10.00
Settled by us and cr. to S. F. Austin 11.94
